text:
rundhatE saptadaqSO Ba#vatyaqnnAdyaqsyA va#ruddhyAq athOq praiva tEna# jAyanta Ekaviq(gm)qSO Ba#vatiq prati#ShThityAq athOq ruca#mEqvA&&*tman da#dhatE caturviq(gm)qSO Ba#vatiq catu#rvi(gm)Satirad^^rdhamAqsAH sa#M~MvathsaqraH sa#M~MvathsaqraH su#vaqrgO lOqkaH sa#M~Mvathsaqra Eqva su#vaqrgE lOqkE prati# tiShThaqntyathO# EqSha vai 
vi#ShUqvAn vi#ShUqvantO# Bavantiq ya EqvaM ~MviqdvA(gm)sa# EqtA Asa#tE caturviq(gm)qSAt pRuqShThAnyupa# yanti saM~Mvathsaqra Eqva pra#tiqShThAya# - [  ] 12
